data.question: Is there any age restriction to use applyfree?
data.answer: applyfree's content goes live only after a reviewing process so that the content itself doesn't harm anybody in general. However, in order to sign a contract you have to be considered legally an adult in your local state or country.

data.question: I'm an underage student. How should I use applyfree?
data.answer: You can use our search engine and have an account as a student. But to sign a contract, send it to your parent/guardian. They will have to create an account for themselves and sign the contract on behalf of you.

data.question: I have an open offering. How should I publish it in applyfree's network?
data.answer: Sign in with your account credentials and find the new contract button in the upper left corner of the dashboard's page.

data.question: What types of contract offerings won't be accepted?
data.answer: Irrelevant contracts (to education purpose) and Contracts with 'not applicable' terms are not accepted.

data.question: Can I enter a contract with a user role other than a student?
data.answer: Yes. Any user can enter any contract she/he sees in our platform. However, make sure the contract has something to offer to you before entering the contract.

data.question: I'm an international student recruiter and have an offering for tutors. Should I publish it on applyfree?
data.answer: Yes you should. Your target audience is limited to all education parties not students only.

data.question: I'm a GRE tutor. How can I use applyfree for my best interest?
data.answer: First of all you may find a great study abroad offering you can't resist to become an student again. Secondly, you can both find/enter and create/accept contracts with all education parties including students and recruiters.

data.question: What is actually free in applyfree?
data.answer: Use of every service in our platform is completely free of any monetary charge for students. Although, before creating a new contract, enterprises should sign a contract with applyfree LLC which includes information about our fees.

data.question: What are three types of contracts in applyfree platform?
data.answer: free deals, paid services and affiliate marketing transactions(referral schemes).
